medical_history.chief_complaint: Left testicular discomfort associated with mild swelling.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week prior to the visit. No history of pyrexia or scrotal trauma was reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Large abdominal wall lipoma excised at 4 years of age.
medical_history.family_history: Patient has seven siblings; two had macrocrania, a sister with hyperthyroidism, and another sister diagnosed with breast cancer in her early thirties.
